entity.description: Prospect or potential sales opportunity. Leads are converted into accounts, contacts, or opportunities when they are qualified. Otherwise, they are deleted or archived.

attributes.name: leadid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the lead.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was created.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: ownerid
attributes.description: Owner Id

attributes.name: owningbusinessunit
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record

attributes.name: owninguser
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.

attributes.name: owningteam
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the team that owns the record.

attributes.name: versionnumber
attributes.description: Version Number

attributes.name: importsequencenumber
attributes.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddencreatedon
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: timezoneruleversionnumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: utcconversiontimezonecode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: fullname
attributes.description: Combines and shows the lead's first and last names so the full name can be displayed in views and reports.

attributes.name: processid
attributes.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

attributes.name: stageid
attributes.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

attributes.name: traversedpath
attributes.description: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

attributes.name: parentaccountid
attributes.description: Choose an account to connect this lead to, so that the relationship is visible in reports and analytics.

attributes.name: parentcontactid
attributes.description: Choose a contact to connect this lead to, so that the relationship is visible in reports and analytics.

attributes.name: address1_addressid
attributes.description: Unique identifier for address 1.

attributes.name: address1_addresstypecode
attributes.description: Select the primary address type.

constrainedList.name: lead_address1_addresstypecode
constrainedList.description: Type of address for address 1, such as billing, shipping, or primary address.

attributes.name: address1_city
attributes.description: Type the city for the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_composite
attributes.description: Shows the complete primary address.

attributes.name: address1_country
attributes.description: Type the country or region for the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_county
attributes.description: Type the county for the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_fax
attributes.description: Type the fax number associated with the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_latitude
attributes.description: Type the latitude value for the primary address for use in mapping and other applications.

attributes.name: address1_line1
attributes.description: Type the first line of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_line2
attributes.description: Type the second line of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_line3
attributes.description: Type the third line of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_longitude
attributes.description: Type the longitude value for the primary address for use in mapping and other applications.

attributes.name: address1_name
attributes.description: Type a descriptive name for the primary address, such as Corporate Headquarters.

attributes.name: address1_postalcode
attributes.description: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_postofficebox
attributes.description: Type the post office box number of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_shippingmethodcode
attributes.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to this address.

attributes.name: address1_stateorprovince
attributes.description: Type the state or province of the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_telephone1
attributes.description: Type the main phone number associated with the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_telephone2
attributes.description: Type a second phone number associated with the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_telephone3
attributes.description: Type a third phone number associated with the primary address.

attributes.name: address1_upszone
attributes.description: Type the UPS zone of the primary address to make sure shipping charges are calculated correctly and deliveries are made promptly, if shipped by UPS.

attributes.name: address1_utcoffset
attributes.description: Select the time zone, or UTC offset, for this address so that other people can reference it when they contact someone at this address.

attributes.name: address2_addressid
attributes.description: Unique identifier for address 2.

attributes.name: address2_addresstypecode
attributes.description: Select the secondary address type.

constrainedList.name: lead_address2_addresstypecode
constrainedList.description: Type of address for address 2, such as billing, shipping, or primary address.

attributes.name: address2_city
attributes.description: Type the city for the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_composite
attributes.description: Shows the complete secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_country
attributes.description: Type the country or region for the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_county
attributes.description: Type the county for the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_fax
attributes.description: Type the fax number associated with the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_latitude
attributes.description: Type the latitude value for the secondary address for use in mapping and other applications.

attributes.name: address2_line1
attributes.description: Type the first line of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_line2
attributes.description: Type the second line of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_line3
attributes.description: Type the third line of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_longitude
attributes.description: Type the longitude value for the secondary address for use in mapping and other applications.

attributes.name: address2_name
attributes.description: Type a descriptive name for the secondary address, such as Corporate Headquarters.

attributes.name: address2_postalcode
attributes.description: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_postofficebox
attributes.description: Type the post office box number of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_shippingmethodcode
attributes.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to this address.

attributes.name: address2_stateorprovince
attributes.description: Type the state or province of the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_telephone1
attributes.description: Type the main phone number associated with the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_telephone2
attributes.description: Type a second phone number associated with the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_telephone3
attributes.description: Type a third phone number associated with the secondary address.

attributes.name: address2_upszone
attributes.description: Type the UPS zone of the secondary address to make sure shipping charges are calculated correctly and deliveries are made promptly, if shipped by UPS.

attributes.name: address2_utcoffset
attributes.description: Select the time zone, or UTC offset, for this address so that other people can reference it when they contact someone at this address.

attributes.name: budgetamount
attributes.description: Information about the budget amount of the lead's company or organization.

attributes.name: transactioncurrencyid
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: budgetamount_base
attributes.description: Value of the Budget Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: budgetstatus
attributes.description: Information about the budget status of the lead's company or organization.

attributes.name: companyname
attributes.description: Type the name of the company associated with the lead. This becomes the account name when the lead is qualified and converted to a customer account.

attributes.name: confirminterest
attributes.description: Select whether the lead confirmed interest in your offerings. This helps in determining the lead quality.

attributes.name: customerid
attributes.description: Select the customer account or contact to provide a quick link to additional customer details, such as account information, activities, and opportunities.

attributes.name: decisionmaker
attributes.description: Select whether your notes include information about who makes the purchase decisions at the lead's company.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the lead, such as an excerpt from the company's website.

attributes.name: donotbulkemail
attributes.description: Select whether the lead accepts bulk email sent through marketing campaigns or quick campaigns. If Do Not Allow is selected, the lead can be added to marketing lists, but will be excluded from the email.

attributes.name: donotemail
attributes.description: Select whether the lead allows direct email sent from Microsoft Dynamics 365.

attributes.name: donotfax
attributes.description: Select whether the lead allows faxes.

attributes.name: donotphone
attributes.description: Select whether the lead allows phone calls.

attributes.name: donotpostalmail
attributes.description: Select whether the lead allows direct mail.

attributes.name: donotsendmm
attributes.description: Select whether the lead accepts marketing materials, such as brochures or catalogs. Leads that opt out can be excluded from marketing initiatives.

attributes.name: emailaddress1
attributes.description: Type the primary email address for the lead.

attributes.name: emailaddress2
attributes.description: Type the secondary email address for the lead.

attributes.name: emailaddress3
attributes.description: Type a third email address for the lead.

attributes.name: estimatedamount
attributes.description: Type the estimated revenue value that this lead will generate to assist in sales forecasting and planning.

attributes.name: estimatedamount_base
attributes.description: Value of the Est. Value in base currency.

attributes.name: estimatedclosedate
attributes.description: Enter the expected close date for the lead, so that the sales team can schedule timely follow-up meetings to move the prospect to the next sales stage.

attributes.name: estimatedvalue
attributes.description: Type a numeric value of the lead's estimated value, such as a product quantity, if no revenue amount can be specified in the Est. Value field. This can be used for sales forecasting and planning.

attributes.name: evaluatefit
attributes.description: Select whether the fit between the lead's requirements and your offerings was evaluated.

attributes.name: fax
attributes.description: Type the fax number for the primary contact for the lead.

attributes.name: firstname
attributes.description: Type the first name of the primary contact for the lead to make sure the prospect is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: industrycode
attributes.description: Select the primary industry in which the lead's business is focused, for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis.

constrainedList.name: lead_industrycode
constrainedList.description: Type of industry with which the company or organization of the lead is associated.

items.displayName: Agriculture and Non-petrol Natural Resource Extraction

attributes.name: initialcommunication
attributes.description: Choose whether someone from the sales team contacted this lead earlier.

constrainedList.name: initialcommunication
constrainedList.description: If there has been initial communication with this lead.

attributes.name: jobtitle
attributes.description: Type the job title of the primary contact for this lead to make sure the prospect is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: lastname
attributes.description: Type the last name of the primary contact for the lead to make sure the prospect is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: lastusedincampaign
attributes.description: Shows the date when the lead was last included in a marketing campaign or quick campaign.

attributes.name: leadqualitycode
attributes.description: Select a rating value to indicate the lead's potential to become a customer.

constrainedList.name: lead_leadqualitycode
constrainedList.description: Quality of the lead, such as hot, warm, or cold.

attributes.name: leadsourcecode
attributes.description: Select the primary marketing source that prompted the lead to contact you.

attributes.name: masterid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the master lead for merge.

attributes.name: merged
attributes.description: Tells whether the lead has been merged with another lead.

attributes.name: middlename
attributes.description: Type the middle name or initial of the primary contact for the lead to make sure the prospect is addressed correctly.

attributes.name: mobilephone
attributes.description: Type the mobile phone number for the primary contact for the lead.

attributes.name: need
attributes.description: Choose how high the level of need is for the lead's company.

attributes.name: numberofemployees
attributes.description: Type the number of employees that work at the company associated with the lead, for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis.

attributes.name: pager
attributes.description: Type the pager number for the primary contact for the lead.

attributes.name: participatesinworkflow
attributes.description: Shows whether the lead participates in workflow rules.

attributes.name: preferredcontactmethodcode
attributes.description: Select the preferred method of contact.

constrainedList.name: lead_preferredcontactmethodcode
constrainedList.description: Preferred contact method for the lead.

attributes.name: prioritycode
attributes.description: Select the priority so that preferred customers or critical issues are handled quickly.

attributes.name: purchaseprocess
attributes.description: Choose whether an individual or a committee will be involved in the  purchase process for the lead.

constrainedList.name: purchaseprocess
constrainedList.description: The type of Purchase Process for this lead.

attributes.name: qualificationcomments
attributes.description: Type comments about the qualification or scoring of the lead.

attributes.name: revenue
attributes.description: Type the annual revenue of the company associated with the lead to provide an understanding of the prospect's business.

attributes.name: revenue_base
attributes.description: Value of the Annual Revenue in base currency.

attributes.name: salesstage
attributes.description: Select the sales stage of this lead to aid the sales team in their efforts to convert this lead to an opportunity.

constrainedList.name: lead_salesstage
constrainedList.description: The sales process stage that this entity is in.

attributes.name: salesstagecode
attributes.description: Select the sales process stage for the lead to help determine the probability of the lead converting to an opportunity.

constrainedList.name: lead_salesstagecode
constrainedList.description: Current stage of the sales process for the lead.

attributes.name: salutation
attributes.description: Type the salutation of the primary contact for this lead to make sure the prospect is addressed correctly in sales calls, email messages, and marketing campaigns.

attributes.name: schedulefollowup_prospect
attributes.description: Enter the date and time of the prospecting follow-up meeting with the lead.

attributes.name: schedulefollowup_qualify
attributes.description: Enter the date and time of the qualifying follow-up meeting with the lead.

attributes.name: sic
attributes.description: Type the Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code that indicates the lead's primary industry of business for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis.

attributes.name: statecode
attributes.description: Shows whether the lead is open, qualified, or disqualified. Qualified and disqualified leads are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

attributes.name: statuscode
attributes.description: Select the lead's status.

constrainedList.name: lead_statuscode
constrainedList.description: Reason for the status of the lead.

attributes.name: subject
attributes.description: Type a subject or descriptive name, such as the expected order, company name, or marketing source list, to identify the lead.

attributes.name: telephone1
attributes.description: Type the work phone number for the primary contact for the lead.

attributes.name: telephone2
attributes.description: Type the home phone number for the primary contact for the lead.

attributes.name: telephone3
attributes.description: Type an alternate phone number for the primary contact for the lead.

attributes.name: purchasetimeframe
attributes.description: Choose how long the lead will likely take to make the purchase, so the sales team will be aware.

constrainedList.name: purchasetimeframe
constrainedList.description: The timeframe that this lead is likely to make a purchase in.

attributes.name: websiteurl
attributes.description: Type the website URL for the company associated with this lead.

attributes.name: slaid
attributes.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the Lead record.

attributes.name: slainvokedid
attributes.description: Last SLA that was applied to this case. This field is for internal use only.

attributes.name: onholdtime
attributes.description: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

attributes.name: lastonholdtime
attributes.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

attributes.name: followemail
attributes.description: Information about whether to allow following email activity like opens, attachment views and link clicks for emails sent to the lead.

attributes.name: timespentbymeonemailandmeetings
attributes.description: Total time spent for emails (read and write) and meetings by me in relation to the lead record.

attributes.name: accountid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the account with which the lead is associated.

attributes.name: contactid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the contact with which the lead is associated.

attributes.name: yomicompanyname
attributes.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the lead's company name, if the name is specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls with the prospect.

attributes.name: yomifirstname
attributes.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the lead's first name, if the name is specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls with the prospect.

attributes.name: yomifullname
attributes.description: Combines and shows the lead's Yomi first and last names so the full phonetic name can be displayed in views and reports.

attributes.name: yomilastname
attributes.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the lead's last name, if the name is specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls with the prospect.

attributes.name: yomimiddlename
attributes.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the lead's middle name, if the name is specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls with the prospect.
